description: User Interface has become a more vital part of software development and a field itself. A better Interface for any software product makes it user-friendly. Ease of usage, reliability is taken for granted for software products. This major will take you through the fundamentals of Human-Computer Interaction, Helps you identify what makes a computer system able to model to match human diversity. This major will help you learn how to design a Graphical User Interface, Explore how humans interact with a computer, Apply windows Navigation Schemes
